item.name: Night Visor
entries: A night visor appears to be a belt-like ring of black metal, a bit over one inch wide and with a diameter of about two feet. A warforged can attune to the night visor, at which point it is placed around its head, covering its eyes. The night visor shrinks to fit the warforged once attuned. While the night visor is attached, it cannot be removed against the warforged's will. A warforged attuned to a night visor has darkvision to a range of 60 ft.

item.name: Tactical Armor
entries: This leather composite armor from old era reduces damage taken by 5 and grants advantage on all saving throws.

item.name: Glaive of Kalok Shash
item.reqAttune: by a believer of Kalok Shash
entries: A glaive blessed by Kalok Shash.
This weapon has +1 to attack and damage rolls.
It also deals additional ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage if the target is evil.

trait.name: Warforged Resilience
entries: The warforged has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Final Messenger
entries: If Saber is disabled, destroyed, or rendered {@condition unconscious}, his fnal messenger fies off to a message station where a message will be relayed to the Lord of Blades. The fnal messenger is a delicate winged assembly that deploys from his chest and carries a vision of his last moments. It has armor class 20, 10 hit points, and a fy speed of 60 ft.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warforged makes two longsword attacks or a longsword attack and an iron fsts attack.

action.name: Longsword +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Iron fists
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Flaming Bolts
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Rage
entries: When Cutter is reduced to under 30 hit points, she fies into a rage at the start of her next turn. While in a rage, her Battleaxe attacks do 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage. The rage lasts for 3 rounds.

trait.name: Warforged Resilience
entries: Cutter has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Final Messenger
entries: If Cutter is disabled, destroyed, or rendered {@condition unconscious}, her fnal messenger fies off to warn Saber. The fnal messenger is a delicate winged assembly that deploys from Cutter's chest and carries a vision of her last moments to Saber. It has armor class 20, 10 hit points, and a fy speed of 60 ft.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.
Adjustments To increase the diffccutt of this encocnter, give Cctter:

items.name: Raging Multiattack
items.entry: Cutter makes two melee attacks whiue raging.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Dwarves have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dolom makes two melee or ranged attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When Eranna roll a 1 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Halfings have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfing Nimbleness
entries: Halfings can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than theirs.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: Halfings can attempt to hide even when obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than them.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Elaydren is a 3rd level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (Spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). She knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Artisan's Intuition
entries: When Elaydren makes an ability check with artisan's tools, roll {@dice 1d4} and add it to the result.

trait.name: Maker's Gift
entries: Elaydren knows the cantrip mending.

trait.name: Magecraft
entries: Elaydren can create a temporary magic item out of common materials. Choose a cantrip from the wizard spell list. Describe the item connected to it. As long as she possesses the item, she knows that cantrip. At the end of a long rest, she can replace it with a new item and select a new cantrip from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is her spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

trait.name: Spellsmith
entries: Elaydren can spend one minute to weave a temporary enchantment into a nonmagical suit of armor or weapon. For the next hour the object becomes a magic item, gaining a +1 bonus to AC if it is armor or a +1 bonus to hit and damage if it is a weapon. Once she uses this trait, she can't use it again until she fnishes a long rest.

trait.name: Potion of Greater Healing (Single use)
entries: Elaydren regains {@dice 4d4 + 4} hit points.

trait.name: Magecrafted Bracelet
entries: As long as Elaydren wears her silver bracelet set with onyx and pearls, she knows the cantrip minor illusion.

action.name: Dagger +1 (spellsmith)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Nibbur can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

action.name: Tailoring Shears
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the Mandy hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If Mandy surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the frst round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Mandy makes two melee attacks

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Skakan can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Agent of the Lord of Blades

trait.name: Warforged Resilience
entries: The agent has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Final Messenger
entries: If the agent is disabled, destroyed, or rendered unconscious, his {@creature final messenger|EXE} fies off to warn Saber, The {@creature final messenger|EXE} is a delicate winged assembly that deploys from his chest and carries a vision of his last moments. It has armor class 20, 10 hit points, and a fly speed of 60 ft.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the agent can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The agent deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the agent that isn't incapacitated and the agent doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: A shifter has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Shifting
entries: As a bonus action, a shifter assumes a more bestial appearance for 1 minute. When shifted, it gains 6 temporary hit points and a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shifter makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its dagger.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite (only when shifted)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Protection
entries: When an attacker the warforged can see makes an attack roll against a creature within 5 feet of the warforged, the warforged can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: A shifter has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Brute Force
entries: Şol deals extra 1d6 damage with his weapons (included in the attacks below).

trait.name: Action Surge (1/day)
entries: On his turn, Şol takes one additional action.

trait.name: Indomitable (1/day)
entries: Şol can reroll a failed saving throw.

trait.name: Brutish Durability
entries: Şol adds {@dice 1d6} to his saving throw rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Şol makes three attacks with his {@item glaive of kalok shash|Canberron} and one attack with {@item glaive of kalok shash|Canberron} (opposite end) or three unarmed strikes.

action.name: {@item Glaive of Kalok Shash|Canberron}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d10 + 1d6 + 6}) slahing damage. If the target is evil, it takes additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: {@item Glaive of Kalok Shash|Canberron} (Opposite End)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d4 + 1d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is evil, it takes additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d8 + 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Second Wind (1/day)
entries: Şol gains 18 ({@dice 1d10 + 12}) hit points.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: Şol can move up to his movement speed toward a hostile creature he can see or hear. Şol must end this move closer to the enemy than he started.

bonus.name: Tunnel Fighter
entries: As a bonus aciton, Şol can enter a defensive stance that lasts until the start of his next turn. While in his defensive stance, he can make opportunity attacks without using his reaction, and he can use his reaction to make a melee attack against a creature that moves more than 5 feet while within his reach.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Şol's innate spellcasting ability is Constitution (spell save {@dc 14}). Şol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monster.name: Calderus
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then {@condition paralyzed} until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 80 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants. This flaw isn’t caused by its nature, rather by the accord among vampires.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place, the vampire is {@condition paralyzed} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: C-14 Pilot
entries: Calderus has proficiency with all vehicles. While she's using air cehicles, she makes all vehicle handling checks with advantage.

trait.name: Tactical Armor
entries: Calderus is wearing her {@item tactical armor|Canberron}.

action.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
entries: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage plus 17 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape {@dc 21}).

action.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a {@creature vampire spawn|MM} under the vampire's control.

action.name: Charm
entries: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be {@condition charmed} by the vampire. The {@condition charmed} target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.

Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
entries: The vampire magically calls {@dice 4d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats||bats}, provided that the sun isn't up. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Strike
entries: The vampire makes one attack.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The vampire makes one bite attack.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, Thuranne can deal an extra 21 {@damage 6d6} damage to one creature she hits with an attack if she has advantage on the attack roll. She doesn't need advantage on the attack roll if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it, that enemy isn't incapacitated, and she doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: When Thuranne is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Thuranne makes thre attacks: one with her {@item blade of selves|Canbrew} and two with her {@item shadow sword|HHHVIII}.

action.name: {@item Blade of Selves|Canbrew}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: {@item Shadow Sword|HHHVIII}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Insightful Fighting
entries: Thuranne makes a Wisdom (Insight) check against a creature she can see that isn't incapacitated, contested by the target's Charisma (Deception) check. If she succeeds, she can use her Sneak Attack against that target even if she doesn't have advantage on the attack roll, but not if she has disadvantage on it.
This benefit lasts for 1 minute or until she successfully uses this feature against a different target.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Thuranne takes take the {@action Dash|PHB}, {@action Disengage|PHB}, or {@action Hide|PHB} action.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When an attacker that Thuranne can see hits her with an attack, she can use her reaction to halve the attack's damage against her.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Thuranne's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). Thuranne can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
